name: The Undisputed Lennox Lewis Trivia Game | Boxing | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
London, England.

	Lennox Claudius Lewis was born on 2nd September, 1965.

The Lion.

	Lennox has even set up his own business, 'Lion Promotions', to promote his fights.

questions.text: In 1991, who did Lennox beat to become the British champion?
questions.explanation:
Gary Mason.

	The fight took place on 6th March, 1991 in London, England. Lennox won by technical knockout in the 6th round.

questions.text: Who did Lennox first lose his heavyweight title to?
questions.explanation:
Oliver McCall.

	McCall won by TKO in round 2 on 24th September, 1994, but three years later in the rematch, Lewis regained the crown with a TKO in the 5th round.

questions.text: At what weight did Lennox win Olympic gold in 1988?
questions.explanation:
Super Heavyweight.

	Lewis beat Riddick Bowe in the Olympic final, a man, who, despite all the 'trash talk', never wanted to face Lennox in the ring as a professional.

questions.text: When Lewis beat Evander Holyfield on points in November 1999, how many belts did he then hold?
questions.explanation:
4.

	Lewis became the undisputed champion of the world, holding the WBC, WBA, IBF and IBO titles.

questions.text: Who did Lennox face in the ring on June 8th, 2002 in Memphis, Tennessee?
questions.explanation:
Mike Tyson & Tyson.

	Lewis knocked out Tyson in the 8th round after dominating the fight. Straight afterwards, Tyson said that he didn't want a rematch as he thought he could never beat Lennox. Later, he came to the conclusion that another payday wouldn't be that bad after all!

questions.text: Where did Lennox face Frank Bruno in a WBC title match in 1993?
questions.explanation:
Cardiff, Wales.

	Lewis beat Bruno with a TKO in the 7th round in an all English encounter.

questions.text: What is the name of Lennox's mother?
questions.explanation:
Violet.

	She is always at ringside for every fight!

questions.text: Who did Lennox represent at the Olympics in 1988?
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	Thanks for taking this quiz. Hope you enjoyed it.
